alert.note: Alert for Cheyenne (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 7:30PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Cheyenne County through 715 PM MDT... At 629 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles east of Gurley, or 17 miles northeast of Sidney, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Cheyenne County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
